game_description: CZD is currently in EARLY ACCESS! <Chosun Zombie Defense> is a stage-based zombie defense VR game where players eliminate the approaching zombies using weapons from the Chosun Dynasty era. How To Play Use the unique abilities and the Ultimates of each weapon to strike down the zombies! Use random skills that you can obtain after clearing a wave! Game Objective The goal of the game is to clear the stages while immersed in historical Korean locations filled with unique zombies. Key Features Relish the satisfaction of eliminating zombies by combining various weapons and skills.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan), French (France), German, Japanese, Korean
review_1: I really like where this game is heading- interesting progression system with weapons and charms. Also like the Korean story and atmospheric music. I look forward to see how this game develops.
review_2: I was pleasantly surprised at what you can do in this game. It isn't just another zombie wave shooter. It has a story, multiple weapons, upgrades, unlockables and much more. A fresh approach into the VR zombie genre with loads more content still to come. https://youtu.be/Z8BqTMGS5-Y
